title: Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 50A 12VDC
blurb:
Single pole thermal circuit breaker. Auto or manual reset. 12 and 24VDC in current ratings from 20 - 50A.
SF-4100 Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 20A 12VDC
SF-4102 Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 30A 12VDC
SF-4104 Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 40A 12VDC
SF-4106 Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 50A 12VDC
SF-4108 Chassis Mount Autoreset Circuit Breaker 20A 24VDC
